entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as being rescued from the Dursleys.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and is mentioned as writing to Hermione saying they were going to rescue Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Ron and Harry. She wrote a letter to Ron and Harry, expressing her concern for Harry's safety.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: Errol is an owl that delivers letters in the story. It is mentioned as being limp and pathetic.

relationships.description: Ron helped rescue Harry from the Dursleys.
Ron wrote to Hermione saying they were going to rescue Harry.
Harry was rescued from the Dursleys by Ron and others.
